name: Neon Rush (Ciriak)
description:
Rate and vote for us here

Created in 72h for the 47th Ludum Dare

Neon Rush is a little platformer game where you play as a little robot that must reach a portal to get out of a time loop.

Reach the final level and post your best time !

Controls : Arrow keys and the spacebar for jumping

Credits :

-  Cyriaque DELAUNAY : Conception and code
- Elisa DILMANN: Art
- Antoine PITTILLONI : Sound design

Soundtrack available [HERE]
